page.title: 03A School Day at Dunnington
page.content: My name is Sharon Stinton. Today I got up at 7-45am, washed, dressed in jeans and a jumper. For breakfast I had toast with jam and a cup of tea. I watched a video taped from the television last night. I washed up and mum drove me to school at 8-45am. At 9-00am we set off in the coach to Stratford swimming pool. The whole school goes swimming every Monday morning. We got back to school at 10-30am and Amanda and I sold crisps during playtime. After play we did English until lunchtime. Those of us who brought sandwiches were allowed to eat them on the school playing field. After lunch, at 1-00pm, we did some maths. At 2-15pm we went out to play again. Amanda and I fed the school rabbit. After break Mr. Reeks read us a story. At 3-30pm mum took us home. I watched t.v. until bedtime at 8-30pm.
